subject: Public Speaking
title: The Attention Economy
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Attention Economy.

hook.text: Average attention span: 8 seconds. You have 8 seconds.

buildup.text: Phones, thoughts, and boredom compete with every word you say.

discovery.text: Speakers must earn attention every 30 seconds or lose it.

twist.text: Attention isn't given. It's fought for, won, and maintained.

climax.text: Understanding attention psychology transforms your speaking.

punchline.text: Fight for attention every moment. Never assume it.
